Description_lang: Sets up $213004s1 decoy traps around the caster and the caster hides amongst them. After several seconds, the caster explodes the real trap, inflicting massive Fire damage to enemies within $213005A1 yards. Touching a decoy causes that decoy to explode for Fire damage to enemies within $213054A1 yards. Finding the caster instead of a decoy causes the decoy to backfire, inflicting Fire damage to the caster and stunning them for $213060D.
